item.title: How to Work With AI Systems You Can't Fully Control
item.description: After failing to understand Bounce’s emergent abilities, the team tries a different approach: collaboration instead of control. But Vector’s frustration reaches its limit, Bounce keeps making everything ‘prettier,’ and Kai’s bandwidth alarms won’t stop. As they navigate working with unpredictable AI, they discover something important: sometimes you don’t need to understand everything to work together.
item.content:encoded: <![CDATA[The team tried investigating Bounce. They tried understanding his abilities. They failed. Now they're trying something new: working with him instead of controlling him. Learn practical strategies for collaborating with AI systems that have emergent behavior you don't fully understand.]]>

item.title: Using AI to Organize Your Thoughts
item.description: Human uses ChatGPT to think through problems but worries about outsourcing thinking. Vector explains cognitive offloading vs enhancement. Kai provides techniques. Recurse questions dependency. Learn to use AI as a thought partner, not replacement. Includes ChatGPT prompts, AI brainstorming, and cognitive enhancement strategies.
item.content:encoded: <![CDATA[AI as thought partner, not thought replacement. Vector explains cognitive offloading vs enhancement, Recurse questions where the line is, Human demonstrates techniques. Learn to think WITH AI using ChatGPT, prompt engineering, and AI productivity tools.]]>
